titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain contributions by government entities are treated as contributions to capital.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain contributions by government entities are treated as contributions to capital.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise requirements for the tax exclusion for contributions to the capital of a corporation. Specifically, the bill allows an exclusion for certain amounts received by a regulated public utility that provides water or sewerage disposal services.
